Text: Check out the uniquely rotten performance of the "son".
walter matthau . not worth putting in the cast as it is a small role .

C'mon ...Walter Matthau, (along with John Carradine), plays the part of a major antagonist in this story. This leads eventually to a great showdown between he & Lancaster. The whip-cracking Matthau against the punch throwing Lancaster! One of the best scenes in the film!
